titleStmt.title: Gratiæ ludentes Iests, from the vniuersitie. By H.L. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: H. L., Oxon.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Tho. Cotes, for Humphrey Mosley,

notesStmt.note: The Bodleian Library copy is correctly dated; the British Library copy and the Rosenbach Foundation copy are misdated "1628" and corrected in ink to "1638"--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
